topic.title: Can't post to ZeroBoard - Message submit failed! undefined
zeronet @ tor
topic.body:
looks like tor is not working on windows. auto-dl doing nothing. manually placed tor files seems not starting up.
 btw, aboutfile speaks of utils dir, whereas dir is tools here.

topic.title: How to reverse post order?
topic.body:
I hate newest on top, need to change to human-readable view with oldest in first place.
I'm talking about answers, not topics.

1_1KTyMhnssBpFUGavNRXQ5YNc15xTLkcfwD.body:
Chatservers for v0.6: https://retroshare.rocks
Newest builds: https://adorabilis.wordpress.com/2015/05/04/retroshare-news-2/

1_153yJaRcL3ECYXYqnKAFWeRUHYs5rQiaj9.body: https://retroshare.rocks - list of available chatservers, for joining public community.

2_1APx2pf1wNGFz4mWCN2sFzrtTGzrLKZUQ2.body:
I see some inaccuracy in blog post: Do we have to start with --tor enable or tor enabled by default? 
Nevertheless, tor still does not download nor starts (if put manually) in my case.
I don't see any tor-related strings in the console. Webinterface stays at Tor: Waiting
Log has many of
TorManager Creating new socket to blablabla.onion:15441 (port is everytime the same - isn't this a bug btw?)
and in the beginning
 DEBUG    TorManager Tor proxy port 127.0.0.1:9050 check ok
which is obviously wrong

1_1APx2pf1wNGFz4mWCN2sFzrtTGzrLKZUQ2.body: okay, problem was caused by noscript plugin blocking access to zeronet.io

1_17f9JktS2GHAoSEe7xofbpZxmXBVb1RShS.body:
Anonymity OR speed - choose one, that's it.
And you can add to your list an internal feature of zeronet - optional files. And also a a separate technology called IPFS

1_1LcaN7rwjqypHivGDHqnX4FXtrG6RKBe7w.body: There is shutdown item on zero start page. And it does not autostart.

2_1KMxiVcvnJ2vFFGWNYhujgFNWYvNrxdVmo.body:
Be cautious - there are some malicius forks - https://i.imgur.com/cRBrr6z.png
link from https://torrentfreak.com/popcorn-time-fork-claims-official-relaunch-after-mpaa-shutdown-160225/

1_15k25aCTwyHfXnqtqpRvBbkDz5ka7gFuuU.body:
testingzeronet12
you forgot the init command. it is a commandline option.
and you are crazy man to run this from system root )

1_1NpaQyMLjikY9FXdfyG4p8CNmS2YrupsRR.body:
testingzeronet12> [testingzeronet12](#comment_83_1CMjV2r4EBpFt8VCcWWZKDysZXPcPExRNN): I'm trying to use RetroShare and make it work with Tor, but the interface is very confusing. I was wondering if anybody here would like to buddy up with me as I try to get it working? I need someone to basically friend me on retroshare and swap messages to see if I can get it working consistently and anonymously.

i can peer with you on RS, PM me to dude @ zeromail

2_1EpY11syeaKbwRSNqv9tU1ZxoU1moJA9Bp.body: video is playing, but page says Your system doesn't seem to be running IPFS
